page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
The field work for this block in the Project was carried out by{3rd Year pupils at Linlathen High School, Dundee under the supervision of Mr R.G.Rae, Principal Teacher of Geography and Mrs Bell from the Learning Help Department. General editing, photography and collating of pupils work was done by Mr Rae assisted by senior pupils Lorna Campbell, Heather Mitchell and Pauline Cumming.
Thanks are due to the Rector of the school Mrs J. Wilson, for allowing pupils time off school for extra field work.
* * * * * * * * *
